item.title: 1.5 hour lesson in Azabu Juban
item.description: (written 12:54 Friday 06 October 2017 JST) On Monday I got my bag back from ML, where I had left it the previous week while substituting on the 7th floor. I found out then that they have a show room and after I got my bag, I went to it. They have a lock which can be reset with one key and relocked with any 1 of another set of keys, which then becomes the only key which can unlock it (except the reset key, of course).
